hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.description: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

personalInformation.title: Personal Information
personalInformation.description: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support. This may include:

items.nameContact: Name and contact information (email, phone number)
items.communications: Communications with us and other users

usageInformation.title: Usage Information
usageInformation.description: We automatically collect certain information about your use of our services, including:

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: We use the information we collect to:

items.provideServices: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
items.processTransactions: Process transactions and send related information
items.sendNotices: Send technical notices, updates, and support messages
items.respondComments: Respond to your comments and questions
items.monitorAnalyze: Monitor and analyze trends and usage
items.ensureSafety: Ensure safety and security on our platform

informationSharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
informationSharing.description: We may share your information in the following circumstances:

items.withUsers: With other users as necessary to provide our services
items.withProviders: With service providers who assist us in operating our platform
items.requiredByLaw: When required by law or to protect our rights
items.businessTransfer: In connection with a business transfer or acquisition
items.withConsent: With your consent or at your direction

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: 5. Your Rights
yourRights.description: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

items.accessUpdate: Access and update your personal information
items.deleteAccount: Delete your account and associated data
items.requestCopy: Request a copy of your data

cookiesTracking.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
cookiesTracking.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and provide personalized content. You can control cookie settings through your browser, but disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our services.

childrenPrivacy.title: 7. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.description: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected such information, we will take steps to delete it.

changesToPolicy.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of our services after any changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contactUs.title: 9. Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:
